channel.title: Pages on Quiqr
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Quiqr

item.title: about
item.description: What is Quiqr? Quiqr is a Hugo specialized, offline desktop CMS application with build in Git functionality for deploying static sites to any hosting server.

item.title: community
item.description: Quiqr is an open source project and we strive to form a healty, open and inspiring community.

item.title: download
item.description: Download Quiqr Quiqr is available for Mac, Windows and Linux. Here are the latest installers.
